author: Adrian Collins
description:
Last Updated on October 29, 2025 In August 2026, Grimdark Magazine will be publishing a new dark fantasy novella by BFA award-winning editor and Nebula-nominated author C.L. Clark. Clark is best known for her Magic of the Lost trilogy, beginning with The Unbroken, the novella Fate’s Bane, and the Arcane novel Ambessa: Chosen of the Wolf. […]

The post Grimdark Magazine acquires world rights to a new C.L. Clark novella appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: Grimdark Magazine acquires world rights to a new C.L. Clark novella

author: Alex Puncekar
description:
We sat down with June Orchid Parker, author of the upcoming sword & sorcery novella Suplex & Sorcery, coming soon from Brackenbury Books. We talk about fantasy, the New Edge Sword & Sorcery novella campaign, and, of course, wrestling. [GdM] Thank you for taking the time for this! Suplex & Sorcery not only has one […]

title: INTERVIEW: with author June Orchid Parker
